inn1.comm: starts off with a lifter, bangs it in outside off and Tamim lets it go
pitches it on middle and leg and curves away, Tamim gets some wood on the ball this time

chopped on.... adjusts to a slightly fuller length on off and middle, Tamim attempts to slice it through the off side but is cramped for room as he ends up chopping it onto his stumps, the legstump is pegged back
strays wide outside the off stump, slants across and wide called
forces the ball into the right hander and Ashraful taps it back to the bowler
beaten him.... pitches it on the corridor outside off and Ashraful pokes his bat out, nearly had the marching orders there
gets across to his offstump and defends through the line to the offside
fullish and swinging down the leg side, that's a wide
better line, gets it to curve into the left hander and Nafees works it straight to cover
big appeal... Langeveldt gets it to curve in towards the line of offstump, Nafees gets forward and defends, the ball strikes him just outside the line of offstump
fullish outside off and worked through the line to cover
gets back and defends back to the bowler
superb stroke.... overpitches on off and middle, Nafees gets forward, meets the ball on the V and pushes it firmly through the line past the bowler, the swift timing guarantees a boundary
pitches on off, he pushes it back to the bowler

Superb judgment at the boundary.... Nel bangs it in short outside the offstump, Ashraful is tempted into the hook, he fails to get the desired elevation to clear long-leg and Albie Morkel runs across from fine leg, fixes his gaze on the ball and takes it on the slide with both hands just inches away from the rope
gets this one to fizz past the left hander outside off
strays just a little wide outside off and luckily no wide called for Nel
switches to round the wicket, pitches it on a good length outside off and gets it to straighten before reaching the keeper
Nafees shoulders arms again
nervy start there, the ball moves away just a tad after pitching and Nazimuddin has a fish at it outside off
pitches further away from the offstump and Nazim safely leaves it
similar delivery, pitches outside off and he leaves it
pitches it slightly fuller, gets it to leave to leave the right-hander again
beaten... gets it to nip back in sharply and that slices the right hander in half, nearly misses the bails there
in the slot to drive and Nazimuddin is off the mark with a gentle push through the line to beat mid-off
overpitches on the legstump, Nazimuddin waits for the ball to slant across him and clips it on the up over square leg, that's his first boundary in ODIs
pitches outside off and curves away, he lets it go
tests him out with a bouncer, Nazim gets on his knee and takes evasive action
gets this one to curve back in, he gets behind the line and defends
gets his bat down on an angle and taps it towards cover

finishes the over the same way he started it.... Nel slants it across from outside off, Nazimuddin takes a couple of paces forward and tucks it away on the up with a flick of the wrists over square leg
tapped in the gap on the off side for a single

pitches on a good length on off and middle and shoots through low to Nazimuddin who's caught at the crease, the ball catches him flush in front of middle stump. Untimely dismissal for Bangladesh just when Nazim was in good rhythm
negotiates his first ball by shouldering arms outside off
watchfully left alone to the keeper this time
adjusts to a fuller length outside off this time, he watchfully shoulders arms again
gets plenty of away movement to beat the lefthander, deVilliers has to slide to his left to stop that
Shoulders arms very close to the offstump, Nel has a few angry words for Nafees, what's eating Nel?
the mindgames have worked for Nel after sledging him the previous ball.... Nel pitches it on the corridor outside off, Nafees pokes at the ball half heartedly and a thin edge is taken easily
bangs it in on a good length outside off and straightens, he lets it go
bangs it in short of a length and nips back in, he defends high on the bat to the offside
pitches it short again and this fizzes past him as he sticks his glove out
slides on the pads and he works it on its way to fine leg
gets back and tucks it in front of square leg with soft hands and sets off fast for a single
bowls over the wicket, Shakib watchfully shoulders arms
slides fairly wide outside off and slants away further, Shakib watches it through
beaten... Shakib pokes forward at a delivery pitched outside off and the ball kicks up alarmingly and beats the outside edge
he covers the line this time and defends
wide outside off and Shakib can't resist a uppish slash down to third man, a sliding stop limits that to a single
draws him forward and Shakib gets an outside edge which rolls past second slip
pitches on a fullish length outside off and draws him forward, he steers it just wide of cover point
gets across, covers the line and defends back to the bowler
gets a big stride across his stumps, he covers the line again and taps it softly back to the bowler
experiments with a bouncer but it doesn't come of well as it sails too high over Shakib, umpire Enamul Haque deems that illegal
pitches outside off and slants across, he leaves it
shoulders arms outside off and the ball wasn't that far from the edge, probing stuff from Nel
full and in the slot to drive, Hassan plays a punchy drive straight to the bowler
hits a good length outside the offstump, he shoulders arms as the ball bends back in
gets across his stumps, closes the face of the bat and tucks it to midwicket
slightly wide outside off and Hassan slices it along the ground to third man
hits a good length outside the offstump, curves away just a touch before reaching the keeper
pitches on middle and off and holds its line, he gets behind the line and defends
pitches outside the offstump, he covers the line and works it to point
pitches it slightly wide outside the offstump, he gets bat down on an angle and dabs it to third man
strays wide outside the offstump, wide called
poor ball and rightfully dispatched.... pitches full outside off, Shakib leans forward and times it well enough to bisect the gap between mid-off and cover
pitches outside off, he shoulders arms
pitches on middle and leg, he hops on the backfoot and taps it back to the bowler
he gets a half stride forward and steers it towards point
pitches short of a length outside off and the ball kicks up on him, he goes for a punchy drive but the ball beats him
controlled this time... he pitches it short of a length outside off again, Raqibul goes for a premeditated upper cut and executes it well as it sails over the slip cordon
gets back and tucks it to the on side
fullish outside the offstump, he drives on the up to mid-off
bangs it in short, Hassan pulls and importantly keeps it down as fine leg picks it up on the first bounce
good length outside off, the ball curves away from the left hander and Shakib does well to slice it in the arc between cover and point
pitches just outside off and comes in a touch, he gets back and defends
pitches outside off and this one kicks up and fizzes past Hassan, nearly had an edge there
gets a stride forward and pushes to mid-off
gets across his stumps and plays a more assured defensive stroke back to the bowler
pitches on a good length outside off, he gets across and works it just wide of point
an attempted yorker turns into a fairly high full toss, that catches him by surprise as he softly taps it back to Morkel
gets across and works it just wide of mid-on, good sliding save in the end
gets across and dabs it with an angled bat down to third man, a slight fumble at the boundary results in a couple
defended to the offside
slides across the right hander, he gets across and tucks it to the on side
on the up but safe.... Nel pitches it up outside off, Raqibul lofts through the line and manages to clear extra cover safely, a few South Africans gets excited
full toss wide outside off, Raqibul reaches out, gets on his knee and bisects the gap between cover and backward point well, good placement there
gets back and across and tucks it to the on side for a single
slides down the legside, he tries to glance it but fails to make contact
slightly shorter, he tries to work it to the on side but taps it back to the bowler
appeal...he gets the ball to slant in towards the pads and he gets a thin inside edge onto his pad, Morkel appeals and umpire Nadir Shah shakes his head
hits a good length outside, he gets a half stride forward and defends to the offside
fullish outside off,  he gets forward and pushes through the line to mid-off
Nel bowls round the wicket, Shakib closes the face of the bat a little and chops it to mid-off
poor shot.... pitches short outside off and curves away, Shakib half heartedly tries to cut but is beaten
pitches on off and middle, he gets across and defends
the slower ball, offcutter, the ball kicks up a little before Shakib tucks it to the on side
this one comes through a lot quicker, he gets behind the line and slices it to  point
tucks it with soft hands in front of mid-on and Shakib calls quickly and sets off for a well-judged single
gets his high backlift down on the ball and chops it down towards the covers
adjusts to a fuller length outside off, he drives through the line but can't beat mid-off
the slower ball on the pads, he uses his wrists and works it to fine leg
Bangs it in slightly short, the ball curves into the right hander as he defends on the hop
pitches it short of a length and comes back in, he stays rooted to the crease and taps it back to the bowler
fuller in length, he turns the face of the bat and softly works it to  midwicket
gives him the charge there, only succeeds in playing back to the bowler
gets across and works it to the on side
makes room, steps down the track and meets the ball on  a full length, he fails to beat mid-off
waits for the ball to turn in, he dabs it down to point
flighted outside off, he drives through the line towards mid-on
charges down the track, he scoops it over the infield on the off side but the shot is safe as the ball lands well in front of long-off
hits a good length outside the offstump, he gets across and taps it to the covers
kicks up higher than expected, he tries to work it to the on side but uneasily fends it to the other side
fires in the yorker, catches Shakib by surprise as he just manages to dig it out to safety
the slower ball, he shapes to cut and ends up chopping it on the bounce to the keeper
bangs it in short, he pulls and Alviro Peterson does well to slide to his left and save it
pushed just in front of mid-on, quick single taken
poor line, flat outside leg stump, turned down to fine leg
now there's some turn! Botha gets this one to rip across the left-hander, pitching on leg and going right across him, with good bounce
appeal for leg before but it pitched outside the line, some good turn there, though
flat on the pads, turned away through square leg
flat again, middle and off, he drives and gets an inside-edge
flat on the pads, tucked away and they run extremely well
short and wide, he rides the bounce and steers wide of gully
pitches on leg, Shakib tucks it down to fine leg for one
tidy delivery on off stump but intelligently played by Raqibul, using soft hands to turn the face and dab it towards gully, then calling for the second, thats well run
short one kicks off from nowhere and de Villiers takes above his head
crucial runs, and the 50-run partnership, as Raqibul opens the face and dabs the ball very fine past the 'keeper for four
full toss on the pads, driven wide of Botha at mid-on
gives it a lot of air outside off and he works it well across the line to deep square leg
flighted very slowly outside off, he gets forward and steers it to  point
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
gets it to loop  in from outside off, he defends on the front foot
pushes it faster, he gets forward and steers it just wide of point for a single
gets across and tucks it towards midwicket
plays a premeditated paddle and gets on his knees, he plays it behind square on the on side for a single
slides towards the pads, the ball clips the base of the pad and lobs to the offside
turns it to the on side and sets off, a sloppy throw to the bowler's end results in an extra run
gets back and punches to the region of extra cover
slides towards the pads, he works it across to the on side
gets a big stride forward and defends back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends to cover
tossed up outside off, he gets forward and defends
streaky....he gives it plenty of air outside off, he reaches out and carves it over backward point
gets back and defends back to the bowler
gets back and across and works it to the on side
flighted in the region of middle and leg, he tucks it through the line to the on side
pushed in flat and fairly quick, he steers it wide of point
pushes it outside leg, he gets on his knee quickly and sweeps to square leg
flighted on middle and leg, he defends on the front foot
gets forward and works it to the on side
flighted on middle, he gets forward and works it to the on side
gets forward and tucks it wide of midwicket for a single
good running, excellent in fact, he pushes it softly on the front foot in front of short cover and sets off fast
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he reaches out and gets a thick outside edge which beats the keeper and short third-man
flighted on middle and leg, he pushes it through the line to long-on
streaky but Hassan will take it, he lunges forward to defend but the extra bounce catches the outside edge and beats the keeper
defended back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends back to the bowler
he picks it from outside the offstump with a turn of the wrists and works it to the on side
gets down for a premeditated sweep but he can;t beat short fine leg
steps down the track but fails to make contact with the bat as the ball turns and clips the pads instead
gives it plenty of air on middle, he turns it to the on side
gives it plenty of air on middle, he turns it to the on side
slides down leg, wide called
slides down leg again, this clips his pad
floated down leg, he works it through the line to mid-on
poor ball, slides down leg
poorer, down leg again, this clips the keepers pads and the batsman steals an extra run
slides down leg, he tucks it through the line to fine leg
pitches on middle and leg, he turns it to the on side
pitches it short of a length and keeps a little low, he plays it back to the bowler
gets forward and pushes it to long-off
gets back and steers it wide of point
gets down on his knee for a premeditated sweep and this time he works in the gap behind square on the on side
pushes to the offside, decides against the single
first false stroke in a long time, he lunges forward and gets beaten for the turn
defended with soft hands to the offside, the throw to the bowler's end is wide and they scamper through for the run
tries to cut but mistimes the ball to the offside
flighted outside off, he drives to the offside
flighted on middle and leg, he works it back to the bowler
low full toss, he works it back to the bowler
low full toss, that single to long-on takes him to 49
flighted outside off, he works it back to the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, he tucks it back to the bowler
stays back at the crease and works it to the on side
gets forward and defends to the offside
the crowd roars as Raqibul Hassan gets forward and steers it wide of point to bring up his fifty, in only his second match
gets forward and pushes it wide of the bowler
the sharp turn from legstump squares him up but he manages to defend to the offside
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
gets forward and drives through the line to long-on
scooped over extra cover, the crowd roars again as the pair bring up the 100 partnership
slides down the legside
gets forward and drives to the covers
steps forward and pushes it firmly back to the bowler
defended back to the bowler
tucks it off his pads just wide of midwicket
gets across and tucks it through the line wide of  mid-on

tossed wide outside off, he goes for an expansive drive and misses, de Villiers whips off the bails and appeals, the umpire sees the Hassan dragging his foot back in time and doesn't call for assistance
nudged off his pads to the on side for a leg bye
pushed through the line to the on side
flighted outside off, he pushes it back to the bowler
gets forward and steers it wide of cover
slides down leg, he loses his line
low full toss on leg stump, he works it through the line to long-on
gets across his stumps and works it wide of midwicket
gets forward and steers it wide of cover for a single
fullish on middle and leg, he works it through the line to long-on
gets forward and steers it wide of cover with an angled bat
gets forward and defends
gets forward and defends to the offside
steps down the track, he checks his stroke and pushes to the offside
gets across and tucks it to the on side, he can't beat square leg
rocks back an punches just wide of cover, easy single taken
starts off with a loosener outside off, he goes for the drive and misses
fullish outside off, he square drives it wide of point, third man runs across to cut it off
fullish outside off again, he gets forward and drives through the line to mid-off
the slower ball, Raqibul lunges forward and drives to mid-off
holds the length back outside off, he gets forward and steers it towards the covers
slightly wide off, Langeveldt is not at full throttle, he plays it down to third man with an angled bat
gets forward and defends
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
takes a few paces down the track, checks his stroke and drives to long-on
flighted outside off, he tucks it back to the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, he works it through the line to long-on
defended back to the bowler

tame end to a controlled innings.... Langeveldt bowls this one slightly short on offstump, the ball stops on the batsman as he tries to pull that over mid-on, he doesn't get the elevation as the ball lands down Smith's throat at mid-on
hits a good length outside off, he steers it to point with an angled bat
full on middle and off, he closes the face of the bat and tucks it to mid-on
skids through a little quicker, he gets behind the line and defends
he fails to put away the full toss as he meet the ball off the splice of the bat and the ball rolls to the off side
beats him on the frontfoot offdrive outside the offstump
fullish on middle and leg, he turns it to long-on
steers it with soft hands on the hop just in front of point and sets off for a well-judged single

appeal and lots and lots of confusion! Ghosh steers it with soft hands towards cover and sets off, he turns back as the fielder swoops the ball and flings it back to de Villiers who collects it with one hand and whips off the bails in one motion. Aleem Dar initially decided against calling for a replay but replays showed that Ghosh was well short of his ground. For a moment there was confusion and coach Mickey Arthur at the dugout near the boundary couldn't comprehend why that wasn't referred. Finally, common sense pevailed and Dar called for assistance.
gets forward and defends towards mid-off
defended back to the bowler
Nel does the trick... Pitches that on a good length just wide of offstump, Razzak goes for an expansive cover drive on the up but ends up getting a thin outside edge to de Villiers
gets back and forces it to long-on
beaten for turn as Mortaza gets forward and the ball creeps through the daylight between pad and bat
gets forward and off the mark with a steer to the offside
gets forward and plays it to the offside
gets squared up by the turn this time as the ball lobs to the offside off the edge of the bat
gets sharp turn again as he rocks back and steers it down to third man
pitches on a good length on off and middle, he gets across and tucks it to midwicket
adjusts his line to outside the offstump, he opens the face of the bat and steers it to point
gets on the backfoot and defends
pitches on middle and leg, he can't tuck it away past square leg
gets across his stumps and tucks it towards midwicket
gets back on his crease and tucks it away behind square on the on side to bring up his fifty
gets forward and defends
flighted on middle and leg, turns it to the on side
appeal... but the ball struck him outside the line of the stumps
pushed towards long-on for a single
defended back to the bowler
tries to work it past the infield behind square on the on side
gets a thick inside edge onto his pads
pushed through the line to long-on
the ball clips his thigh pad and rolls to the on side
pushed back to the bowler
charges down the track,he scoops it over extra cover and the sweeper on the offside runs across to cut it off
waits for the ball to turn back in, he rocks back and cuts to the offside
charges down the track, he tries to scoop it with the turn over the region of extra cover but ends up chipping it straight to Gibbs at short cover
loses his line as he slides down leg beats the keeper, bonus runs
fires that fast on a yorker length, he manages to dig it out
gets forward and gets a thick outside edge, luckily for him the slip was taken off
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
lunges forward and pushes through the line past the covers
opens the face of the bat can't steer it past short third-man
fires that quicker, he punches it towards point
flighted on middle and leg, the ball trickles back to the bowler off his pads
gets across and works it through the line wide of midwicket
stays back, waits for the turn and steers it very softly to the offside and sets off quickly
steps down the track and works it to the on side
the ball lobs off the pad and rolls to the on side, there's confusion in the calling
better running this time as Mortaza tucks it wide of square leg and picks up a second run after a slack effort in the field
defended back to the bowler
steps down and chips it uppishly to long-off
stays back and cuts to short third-man
flighted on middle, defended back to the bowler
hits a good length outside off, he stays back and chooses to defend
gives room to thwack that over the on side but he ends up mis-timing it to long-on
slanted across the left-hander, the ball skids through a little low as he gets a thick outside edge between slip and a wide gully
gives room again, he reaches out to slice a misdirected full toss past the vacant point region, controlled stroke there
gives room again, he misses it completely as he tries to edge it past the wicketkeeper
lands on a fullish length on middle and leg, he works it to the on side

action there....Mortaza pushes to long-on, Gibbs throws to the keeper's end but de Villiers gets a bad bounce, there's an overthrow after the ball beats de Villiers, the throw at the bowler's end hits the stumps but Hossain was safe, the third umpire has a look, Aleem Dar doesn't gamble this time!

Mortaza gives room and pushes it to Morkel at long-off, Mosharraf wanted a second run but Mortaza wasn;t interested as Morkel picks it up and throws it in a flash to the bowler, Nel swoops it back to the keeper and de Villiers whips off the bails while Mosharraf was halfway down the pitch
beats him outside the off stump
beaten outside the offstump again
gives a bit of room to forces it through the offside, beaten again
the slower ball, Mortaza is beaten outside the offstump
Mortaza gives room to slice it over the infield on the off side, he meets the ball off the splice of the bat and mistimes it straight to Harris at extra cover

inn2.comm: pitches outside off, he gets back and tucks it wide of mid-on
angles across the left-hander, he gets forward and works it to the covers
pitches outside off, Smith pushes it to the packed offside field
fullish in length outside off, he gets forward and pushes to cover
slides on the pads, he gets back and across and tucks it to fine leg
stays back and punches it squarer, meets point this time
lands it on a good length outside off and straightens, he defends with a straight bat
comes on dead straight again, he closes the face of the bat and turns it to the on side
pitches a touch wider outside the offstump, he gets his bat down on on angle and steers it to point
steers it wide of point and the fielder charges across to cut it off
comes on straight outside the line of offstump, he stays back at the crease and punches to cover
curves in just a touch to the right-hander, he turns his wrists and works it to fine leg
full and swinging in on the pads, that's bread and butter for Smith as he tucks it in the arc between mid-on and midwicket
pitches outside the offstump, he opens the face and dabs it to third man
Appeal...Smith tries to work it to the on side but gets caught on the pad, replays show a thin inside edge, good umpiring by Nadir Shah
pitches outside off, he steers it to the offside
pitches on off and middle, he stays at the crease and defends
gets the ball to slide back in, Gibbs stays rooted to the crease and chips it uppishly to mid-on
beaten...Smith fishes at one that keeps low outside the offstump, the ball goes through to Ghosh on the bounce
pitches on middle and leg, he tucks it to the on side

trapped on the pads and Gibbs isn't too pleased with the decision.... Mortaza curves it towards the pads, Gibbs shuffles and tries to work it to the on side and the ball catches him on the pads in the region of legstump, the umpire Aleem Dar convinced and Gibbs gives him a look. Was there an inside edge? Maybe
gets on the front foot and defends to the offside
Amla gets forward and drives a full delivery towards the covers and a misfield results in a bonus
this one keeps a little low and Amla opens the face and glides that to point
pitches on a fullish length outside off, he turns his wrists and tucks to midwicket
slower ball, not that Rasel's that quick anyway, Amla pushes it to the offside
Appeal.... pitches just a shade outside leg and slants across, the ball catches Amla a little high on the pad, though not far from the stumps, Rasel appeals and umpire Shah calls it correctly
on the pads, worked on its way behind square on the on side
swinging away from off, he gets forward and pushes to the offside
hits a good length outside off, he stays on the backfoot and punches to the offside

slides towards the pads, he stays on the backfoot and gets the timing and placement right to bisect the gap between mid-on and midwicket, Ashraful nearly pulls it back before the ropes but the outfield was too quick for him
pushes it towards point, the stumps are down at the non-striker's end and they pick up an overthrow
stays on the backfoot and pushes it to the covers
Smith strolls across his stumps before Mortaza delivers, he works it past square leg but there's protection in the deep
Superb execution.... Amla stays at the crease, picks a good length ball on off and middle and tucks it in the gap between mid-on and midwicket with a flick of the wrists, the placement was just right
pitches on middle and leg, he works it to the on side
shuffles across, works it to the on side but can't beat the diving Raqibul Hasan at midwicket
wide and swinging away, he drives through the line to the covers
false stroke from Amla, he gets forward and ends up getting a thick outside edge which rolls past the keeper
gets forward and pushes to the covers
cuts back on the pace, Smith quietly defends on the front foot
pitches close to the pads, he tries to work it to the on side but the ball clips the pads and rolls to the on side, they pick up a run
pitches on middle and again it straightens, he stays back and defends
hits a good length on off and middle, he stays back and defends to the offside
the slower ball, he waits on it and tucks it across the line wide of midwicket
hits a good length on off, he stays back and defends
Amla gets a thick inside edge on his pads as he tries to defend
Smith waits at the crease and dabs it with an open face of the bat to third man
Smith gets an inside edge onto his pads and Rasel withholds the appeal
full in length outside off, he drives through the line to mid-off
pitches wide outside off, he walks across his stumps to chase it and he punches it in the gap between cover and extra cover
pitches it on middle and off, he forced it back to the bowler
grants him width outside off, Smith leans forward, meets the pitch of the ball and caresses it past mid-off and extra cover
flighted on middle, turned to midwicket
drives a full length delivery straight to cover
pitched on middle and kept low, he forced it back to the bowler
jams it on a yorker length, he digs it back to the bowler
tries to work it through the onside, he gets a leading edge to the offside
gets forward and drives wide of covers
the yorker length to start off, well bowled, Amla digs it out
pitches just a shade outside leg, he tries to whip it across the line and meets the ball on the pads, Rasel appeals anyway, Nadir Shah shakes his head, the ball was also slanting across the stumps
fullish outside off, he pushes to the covers
slides down the leg side and fails to control the movement, he whips it off his pads and beats midwicket and the crowded onside field
gets across his stumps and steers it to the offside
tucked to the on side
rocks back at the crease and cuts, he can't beat point
rocks back and just beats extra cover, the fielder at the deep cuts it off
good reflexes.... flighted on off stump, Amla tries to scoop that firmly over the bowler's head but can't clear Razzak as he cups it with both hands over his head and takes it neatly
wrong line, outside leg and he flicks to get off the mark
flat outside off stump, he presses forward and steers to gully
pushes this one past his prodding bat, Dhiman is frustrated
full on the stumps, he shapes to flick but plays to cover instead
gets back and punches it back past the stumps, top shot
good length on the stumps, driven back to Rasel
poor ball, well down leg stump, helped down to fine leg
stretches well forward to a fuller delivery and works it from outside off stump, between the nonstriker's legs, to long-on
tidy stuff, right up there on middle and leg, defended back
spins in from the rough, squares up Smith due to the extra bounce, he does well to take one hand off the bat, ball balloons up and an acrobatic Dhiman tries to take it
spins in again sharply but Smith has gotten well outside the line
bit more air, he lunges forward and defends to point
full and flat, flicked from outside off stump to midwicket
good flight, spins on from the stumps and he defends
flat on middle and off, he makes room and drives to cover
flighted on off stump, he gets across and works it to the on side
tucks it softly to the on side and sets off for  a quick single
tucks it softly to the on side and sets off for  a quick single
pitched on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
stays back at the crease and punches to the offside
moves back and across and punches it wide of the covers
floats it outside off, he waits for the turn before slicing it past point
skids through after pitching, he chops it down to the covers
pushed in slower, he cuts it just wide of short cover and completes the run despite the dive by the fielder

Do we have a match here?.... Razzak gives it plenty of air outside off and cuts back the pace, Smith is induced into the cover drive but lunges too far from his body, he only succeeds in dragging the ball onto his stumps
lunges across his stumps, there quite a bit of turn as he edges onto his pads
fires that flat and fast outside off, the ball lobs off his pads to slip
flighted on middle and off, he drives to the covers
fired in on middle, he digs it back to the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, he forces it back and Shakib dives in vain to stop that
gets down for a premeditated paddle from outside the offstump, they take a couple to fine leg
gets across his stumps and works it to the on side
flighted outside off, he gets on his knee and sweeps behind square
stays at the crease, waits for the turn and whips it to the on side
this one shoots through low and he just manages to keep it out
stays at the crease and tucks it to the on side
gets across his stumps and works it to midwicket
flighted outside off, he gets forwara and meets the ball on the pads, Razzak lets out a stifled appeal
slides down the legside, wide called
he gets forward and works a full delivery on middle and off towards mid-on
stays on the backfoot and cuts to the covers
defends close to the pads outside the line of offstump and Shakib belts out an appeal, Shah shakes his head
pitches outside off, he rocks back and cuts it past extra cover for a couple
defends back to the bowler on the frontfoot
turned to Razzak at midwicket, he fumbles and kicks the ball away by mistake and that allows for an extra run
turn turn turn.... de Villers was squared up by one that hit the rough outside off
rocks back at the crease and turns it to short fine-leg
spin bounce and turn outside off, he rocks back and defends to the offside
defended to the on side
goes for the sweep and misses, Ghosh whips off the bails
stays back at the crease and tucks it straight to midwicket
stays back, waits for the turn and whips it with the turn past the vacant square-leg region
Appeal..pitches way outside the line of offstump, it turns and catches him on the pad, Shakib appeals but Shah says no, probably wouldn't have hit
sweeps outside the line of offstump and fails to make contact with the bat
opens the face and steers it to third man
chops it down to the offside
full and wide outside off, he drives square to the deep on the offside
gets on his knee and sweeps towards short fine leg
hits a good length outside off, he gets his high backlift down and steers it to the covers
stays back and punches a good length delivery just wide of cover for a single
loses his line by straying down the legside, he helps it on its way to fine leg
gets behind the line and punches it off the meat of the bat to point, they contemplate a single but turn it down
gets back and works it just wide of the covers
keeps a little low outside the off stump, de Villiers manages to chop it down just wide of point
defended back to the bowler
gives room outside off and cuts to the offside
flighted on off and middle, tucks it to short fine-leg with the turn and sets off quickly
nudged off his hips to the on side
flighted outside the offstump, he drives through the line to long-off
flighted outside leg, pushed back to the bowler
stays low outside the offstump as de Villiers gets a thick outside edge through the vacant slip cordon
gets this one to cut back in sharply and cramp him for room, yet he manages to chop it down to the offside and take a single
slower ball, lands on a full length outside off, he drives to the covers
nudged off the pads just wide of the keeper, they take a chance with the second run and a direct hit would have sent de Villiers back, surely
slides towards the pads, he works it through the line to the on side
pitches on off stump, cramps him for room again as he defends back to the bowler
turns square off the rough, he sticks his bat out and fends it off
flighted outside off, he gets forward and drives to the covers
pitches outside off and straightens, just beats the outside edge, superb ball
rocks back and defends to the offside
flighted outside off, he defends to the offside
flighted outside off, he defends to the offside
rocks back at the crease and cuts to the sweeper on the offside
shuffles at the crease and works it with the turn to midwicket
stays at the crease and punches through the line to long-on
gets a thick inside edge onto his pads on the offdrive
flighted outside off, he defends to the offside
flighted outside the offstump, he defends back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he charges down the track and drives along the ground to long-off
gets on his knee and drags it from outside off to deep backward square-leg
pitches on off, he stays at the crease and punches to long-on
shuffles across his stumps, waits for the turn and tucks it to deep backward square-leg
worked to the on side
steps down the track, checks his stroke and defends
drives it wide of the covers, Duminy runs well between the wickets and that helps in completing the couple
defended back to the bowler
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
gets forward and steers it with an angled bat towards point
stays back at the crease and works it to long-on
Ashraful bowls seam up (!), de Villiers drives through the line to long-off
slides down the legside, wide called
full toss on the pads, he whips it away to the on side and some good running results in a couple
Asgraful tries to field the ball but deflects to mid-on on the slide
low full toss on the pads, he chips it uppishly over midwicket

Ashraful gets very cheeky and dishes out a rank half tracker which pitches twice to de Villiers, he pushes it to the offside. U may remember de Villiers was out caught and bowled by the same bowler at the same venue in the first Test
pushed to the off side
pushed to the offside
defended back to the bowler
stays back at the crease and pushes to long-off
gets forward to defend, the ball lobs off the pads to the on side
flighted outside leg, he tries to work it to the on side but the ball rolls off his pads
flighted on middle, pushed back to the bowler
gets forward and pushes back to the bowler
flighted outside off, pushed to long-off
flighted outside leg, he pushes it through the line to the on side
stays back and nearly chips it to short midwicket
gets across and turns it wide of midwicket
gets across and whips it across the line to deep midwicket
steps down the track and works it to long-off
shuffles and tucks it straight to short fine-leg
stretches out his pad and smothers the spin
gets across and works it to the on side
stays back at the crease, waits for the turn and dabs it very close to the bodyt down to third man
gets forward and defends
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
gets down early for the sweep and nearly fetches a boundary, short fine-leg runs back and cuts it off
stays back at the crease and cuts it wide of extra cover
pushes this fast and lands on a good length, he waits on it and works it wide of midwicket
stays at the crease, the ball comes on straight
stays back at the crease and punches it through the line to long-on
flighted outside off, he steps down and drives through the line to long-off
cuts back in from outside off, he rocks back and slices it wide of point
gets forward and drives square to the sweeper on the offside
stays back at the crease and chips it over the vacant mid-on region
waits for the turn and drives through the line to long-off
tucks it to the on side, de Villiers starts off for the run but Duminy sends him back immediately
stays back at the crease, waits for the turn and punches to the offside
stays at the crease, waits for the turn and slices it towards point
tossed on middle and off, he gets down and sweeps to fine leg, good placement there as they complete three
defended back to the bowler

leans forward for the drive but inside edge towards silly point, Ghosh catches the batsman out of the crease, dives forward at the ball and in one motion hits the stumps one-handed, acrobatic stuff but AB was safe
defended back to the bowler
swept fine, Ashraful just manages to pull it back before the rope, adjusts his shades before throwing it to the keeper...hmmmm
defended back to the bowler
nudges it wide of short fine leg and picks up a single
gets back and punches just wide of extra cover
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
stays back at the crease, the ball doesnt turn, he defends back to the bowler
rocks back and defends to midwicket
flighted outside off, he punches back to the bowler
stays back at the crease, waits for the turn and whips it to mid-on
the boundary drought is broken.... flighted outside off, the ball turns in off a good length, he rocks back and cuts it wide of cover
defended back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he drives through the line to long-off
tries to nudge it to the on side but the ball clips his pads and rolls away
slides down the leg side
tucked just wide of midwicket and they scamper through for a quick single
Ghish whips off the bails after de Villiers is beaten going for the drive, umpire Shah doesn't call for assistance, no need to as his foot was back at the crease
tucks it to the off side for a single
closes the face of the bat and whips it towards midwicket
pitches on a fullish length outside off, he defends back to the bowler
cramps him for room outside off as he chops it down to the offside while going for the cut
hits a good length outside off, slants across, he glides it down to point
hits a good length outside off, he tries to force it through the offside but chops it down to point again
the ball keeps  a little low as it creeps under the bat on the drive
flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends
flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends
beats him... pitches on middle and squares him up with the turn, the ball just beats outside edge
slides the arm ball down the legside, wide called
stays back at the crease and defends
steps down the track and gets an inside edge onto his pads
rocks back and de Villiers brings up his fifty with a single down to deep cover
hits a good length outside off, he stays back at the crease and slices it wide of point
pitches on middle and off and comes on straight, he turns the face of the bat and tucks it to midwicket
fullish outside off, he drives through the line and beats the vacant areas past cover
stays back at the crease and meets the ball fairly low on the bat as he pushes it to mid-on
hits a good length outside off, he gets his bat down on an angle but can't beat the diving Raqibul at gully
pitches outside off, he gets his bat down and punches it to the covers
shapes to pull this over midwicket, the ball keeps low and an under edge rolls behind the keeper, Duminy takes off, turns back and gets his bat down in time to beat Ghosh's throw at the stumps
makes room and pushes back to the bowler
takes a few paces down the track, meets the ball on  a fullish length and drives back to the bowler
makes room and works it towards long-on
flighted outside off, he steps down the track and pushes to long-off
hits a good length outside off, he pushes it back to the bowler
curves into the right hander, he covers the line and defends back to the bowler
curves on on middle, he turns his wrists and whips it through the vacant square-leg region
cramps him for room outside off, he succeeds in chopping it down to point
and again, he tries to force it through the infield on the offside but can't beat point again
well finally he manages to squeeze one through, this time past the covers
flighted outside off, he drives square and Ashraful does well to slide to his left to save an extra run
steps down the track and can't beat mid-on
slides down the legside, he tries to sweep but fails to beat short fine-leg
works it through the on side
tries to heave it over the top but gets an inside edge onto his pads
tries to carve it through the off side but can't beat the infield
stays back and chops it to the off side
stays back at the crease and whips it to the on side
shuffles and tucks it wide of short midwicket
flighted on middle and leg, he slog sweeps and takes it on the half volley and heaves it over midwicket
steps out and gets an inside edge onto his pads
goes for another heave across the line, he connects but doesn't get the elevation to reach the boundary, the ball lands safe near deep midwicket
rocks back and tucks it away towards midwicket
spin, bounce and turn,... that pitches on off on a shortish length, turns in sharply, Duminy weaves away from the stroke and the ball beats him and the keeper
tries to slog sweep and misses
gets forward and cuts to short third-man
tries to flick and gets an inside edge onto his pads
gets forward and drives through the line to long-on
stays back and plays dangerously close to the body and stumps, he dabs it down to third man for a single
de Villiers is in no hurry as he defends back to the bowler
he stays back at the crease and defends to mid-off
gives him a bit of width outside off, he punches it through the covers
strays on the pads, he gets across and shuffles to midwicket
full and wide outside off, he drives through the line to deep cover
and he seals it with a six.... steps down to a gentle offering from Tamim, lofts it over his head for a big six
